description.value: Whenever Pushing Psychic Technique, can add additional +1 to Psy Rating and +10 to Psychic Phenomena and Perils of the Warp Rolls. However, whenever suffering Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp effects, can make +10 Willpower Test with -5 per Psy Rating used in Focus Power Test. If successful, does not suffer result, instead inflicting it on another target within 5m x Psy Rating (if an area, it is centred on that target). If fail, or no target in range, suffer result as normal.
